Address.Title: {"en":"The Crest Sukhumvit 49","is":"The Crest Sukhumvit 49","th":"The Crest Sukhumvit 49"}
Address.Street: {"en":"Sukhumvit 49/2, Khlong Toei Nuea, Vadhana, Bangkok 10110t","is":"Sukhumvit 49/2, Khlong Toei Nuea, Vadhana, Bangkok 10110t","th":"Sukhumvit 49/2, Khlong Toei Nuea, Vadhana, Bangkok 10110"}

Information.ProjectName: {"en":"The Crest Sukhumvit 49","is":"The Crest Sukhumvit 49","th":"The Crest Sukhumvit 49"}

Description.DescriptionText:
{"en":"

The Crest Sukhumvit 49 

เน€เธ”เธญเธฐเน€เธเธฃเธชเธ—เน เธชเธธเธเธธเธกเธงเธดเธ— 49

For rent เธฟ24,000

Meet the condominium in the city centre which provide all things you need such space, location, privacy and facility.

You will joy life's experience in the heart of the city while having a great relaxation at this living space, 8th floors condominium with 88 units. Close to Thong lo BTS Station, Public transportation, which can walk (7 min walk) or use shuttle bus service.

Location : https://goo.gl/maps/huuyhF2k7ru


Room details

- 34.3 sq.m room ( 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom )

- 5th floor, North side view

- Furniture and amenities

1. Electric appliances ( Television / Refrigerator / Microwave / Electric stove / 2 Air conditioning / Water heater )

2. Bed (5 FT Queen size)

3. Both Shower and Bath in the bathroom

4. Dining table and 2 chairs

5. Sofa in the living room

6. Built-in furniture e.g. closet , shelf and wardrobe

7. Smoke detector

8. Balcony


Condominium facilities

1. Parking lot

2. Shuttle bus service ( Condo - BTS Thong lo - Supermarket - Samitivej Hospital )

3. Swimming pool and fitness centre

4. Rooftop garden

5. 24 hour Security staff

6. Security services e.g surveillance and fire protection system

7. Key card and password for access system ( elevator and room access )


Surrounding place

1. Supermarket 190 m.

2. Spa and Onsen 70 m.

3. Samitivej Hospital 500 m.

4. Sukhumvit 55 ( Thong lo ) 1 km.

5. Variety of foods and complex
